pullRequest.title: Refactor DistinctQueriesTest to cover more scenarios
pullRequest.bodyText:
Test all data types (including BYTES)
Test empty responses
Test merge of non-empty response and empty response for both server side and broker side

TODO:

ORDER BY bytesColumn is not properly supported right now
DistinceTable limit is not properly set

nodes.bodyText: IIUC, this is needed because for the case of empty, it may return a new object as opposed to merging into existing ones?
